data.text: I hope #NSEIndia & its MD& CEO Shri Vikram Limaye would respond immediately.   #TOI #DDNewsLive #livemint #dna #ZeeNews #IndiaToday #the_hindu #outlookindia #indiatvnews #mid_day #htTweets #MumbaiMirror #FinancialXpress #DainikBhaskar #NavBharatTimes #timesofindia #AmarUjalaNews https://t.co/iQO2WKKVCu

.I ask for: 

.Refund retrospectively the Processing Fees charged by #NSEIndia to surrendered members. 

.Let us not maintain just “contacts” but let us remain “connected “; caring and sharing.
.Does #NSEIFSC EXCHANGE charges Rs. 1, 00,000(One Lakhs) as processing Fees for surrender of the membership?

.Does #NSEIndia inform regarding the Processing fees of Rs. 1, 00,000(One Lakhs) for surrender of membership to new members? 

.Provide the reason for charging Rs. 1, 00,000(One lakhs) as Processing Fees to the surrendered members?

.Does #NSEIndia inform through any circular about a processing fee for surrender of membership to members? Give detail?

.Does #NSEIndia inform through any circular to give time to members to surrender their membership before such processing fee is to be applicable by Exchange?

.Which year onwards a processing fee for surrender applicable to members by #NSEIndia? Provide the amount of processing fee year wise? 
.Which year onwards #NSEIndia charges a processing fee of Rs. 1, 00,000(One Lakhs) to surrendered members? https://t.co/JNRqESGNrz

.Some of the questions to #NSEIndia & its MD & CEO Shri Vikram Limaye: Reply in public space only. 
.My questions to Shri Vikram Limaye are as follows:

.#NSEIndia has not maintained the connection with its members.  Make changes in the rules & regulation of surrender of membership for the best interest of its member & refund the money retrospectively. https://t.co/532Re0roFN
